#canstack

The Canadian OpenStack User Group

OpenStack's 3rd Birthday

15 Aug 2013

Posted by curtis

Recently the OpenStack project celebrated it’s 3rd birthday.

The OpenStack Foundation was kind enough to provide #canstack with some funds to celebrate with, so we rallied everyone we could find and who was free to come down to Edmonton’s Sugarbowl and have a bit of food and drink and perhaps discuss OpenStack’s success.

There is a slideshow that has pictures from all of the birthday parties around the world (see slide 54/55 for the Edmonton pictures, and 57-59 for the Toronto OpenStack Users Group party)

So, thanks to the OpenStack Foundation, and I look forward to using future versions of OpenStack.

About

#canstack is a cross-Canada OpenStack users group.
